category: National Team Athletes’ Village Operation Regulations/Article 2 (Location and Name)
contents: Article 2 (Location and Name) ① The National Athletes’ Village (hereinafter referred to as *Athletes’ Village) is located at 105 Seonseonchon-ro, Gwanghyewon-myeon, Jincheon-gun, Chungcheongbuk-do. ② The English name for the athletes’ village is National Training Center of KSOC (abbreviated as KNTC).
